full_summary:
# Underwater Diver Propulsion System

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS3817234646-Doc3826288609
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3817234646
* **Publication Date:** January 13, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** February 13, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date:** February 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 27, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** No end date specified

## Procurement Summary

The Department of National Defence is seeking a supplier to provide 38 Underwater Diver Propulsion Systems for use in both training and operational scenarios. The contract includes an option for additional units. The required services include supply of the systems, training services, maintenance services, and spare parts on an as-needed basis.

## Delivery and Logistics

The systems are to be delivered within 210 days of contract award.

## Contract Administration

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

## Language and Documents

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Important Notes

* Please ignore the response deadline listed in the Ariba Discovery posting.
* Bids must be submitted by 2:00 PM EST on February 13, 2023.
* All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will be declared non-responsive.
* Access the Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments by logging in to your SAP Ariba account.

## Points of Contact

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Department of National Defence (DND)
* Contact Person: Webster, Sean (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: sean.webster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Goods and Service Codes

* UNSPSC: 25111805 (Personal motorized watercraft)
* UNSPSC Description: Personal motorized watercraft
* Procurement Category: GD

Note: HTML formatting was retained where possible to enhance readability. Markdown was used instead where it can be. Some text has been rephrased to make it more concise and clear.
